caption.title: The ion chromatograms of four compounds.
caption.p:
( A) chromatogram of shikimic acid standard, ( A
1 ) chromatogram of shikimic acid in A. heterotropoides var. mandshuricum sample; ( B) chromatogram of phenylalanine standard, ( B
1 ), chromatogram of phenylalanine in A. heterotropoides var. mandshuricum sample; ( C), chromatogram of cinnamic acid standard, ( C
1 ), chromatogram of cinnamic acid in A. heterotropoides var. mandshuricum sample; ( D), chromatogram of p-coumaric acid standard, ( D
1 ) chromatogram of p-coumaric acid in A. heterotropoides var. mandshuricum sample.
